snippet.title: Welcome to SPEAKEASY - Teaser Trailer from Open Late Games
snippet.description:
Presented by Open Late Games, the first look at SPEAKEASY, a visual novel otome video game slated for release in 2023. 

Join Cora West for a whirlwind of forbidden romances found in the depths of a decadent illegal jazz club in Prohibition-era Los Angeles. Direct the heroine’s actions and determine whether she will make it out with her heart intact or lose herself in the glamor and excess.

Will you fall in love? Rule the city?
Or damn it all and descend into ruin?
The choice is yours.

COMING 2023 to Steam and Itch.io

http://www.openlategames.com
